title: Can Karma jg!?
body:
She has a tether that sometimes heals and has a similar cooldown to Yi's meditate (q with ult), a shield(w), and a really high damage AoE waveclear (q), she also gets her ult at lvl 1.

Can she potentially be a competent jg?

replies.body:
Why not give it a run in bots and normals? No harm in trying.

I've tried AD xerath before for sh!ts and giggles. It sucked. hard.
I think of it as similar to AD Malzahar. Yeah it works but it's pretty strange and off meta.
maybe if you had perfect runes for it.
